job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of integrating AI features into a complete product, spanning both front-end and back-end development.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the architectural design and coding of web applications, emphasizing the integration of front-end and back-end, and the use of AI to improve user experience.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the end-to-end responsibility for the software development lifecycle, a key aspect of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of aligning technical solutions with stakeholder needs and driving innovation within the product, a common software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states that the AI work must be integrated into the broader product, reinforcing the software integration aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the full-stack nature of the role and the integration of different development aspects to create scalable solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
job_tasks.justification: This defines the role as focused on building new applications and driving innovation, rather than routine maintenance, which aligns with software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of product development from ideation to completion, utilizing full-stack and AI expertise.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves working directly with LLMs (GPT-4, Claude) to create new tools and features, which falls under model development and innovation in AI.

job_tasks.phrase: specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features
job_tasks.justification: The mention of LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude, and the creation of interactive features, implies interaction with these models, which often involves prompt engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, 'develop and deliver AI applications' implies the underlying data preparation and management needed for these applications to function and demonstrate outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with a diverse team and the need for effective communication of complex ideas.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the importance of continuous learning and staying updated with the latest advancements in AI and web development.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase emphasizes taking full ownership of the development process, aligning with the 'Innovation & Ownership' category.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
job_tasks.justification: Pushing boundaries and driving innovation is a key aspect of this category.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
job_tasks.justification: Directly states the role involves driving innovation and building new applications.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This implies taking initiative and ownership of translating abstract ideas into concrete products.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration and communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the need for continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes taking full ownership of the development lifecycle.

profile.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as architecting and coding web applications, integrating front-end and back-end systems, and owning the full development lifecycle (Macro-Category A). While it involves working with LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude (Macro-Category B tasks), the primary focus is on integrating these AI capabilities into broader web applications rather than deep model development or specialization in GenAI techniques. The description explicitly states it's not for narrow AI development and requires integrating AI across the product, fitting the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the blend of responsibilities. It explicitly contrasts what the role *is* (full-stack integration, ownership, innovation) with what it *is not* (narrow AI development, routine maintenance), making the classification straightforward. The mention of specific LLMs anchors the AI aspect, but the overarching emphasis remains on software engineering.
